name: opelcnv
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), ccnv(c2)), wcel(cop(c1, c0), c2))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), ccnv(c2)), wcel(cop(c1, c0), c2)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), ccnv(c2)), wcel(cop(c1, c0), c2))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), ccnv(c2)), wcel(cop(c1, c0), c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), ccnv(c2)), wcel(cop(c1, c0), c2))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), ccnv(c2)), wcel(cop(c1, c0), c2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), ccnv(c2)), wcel(cop(c1, c0), c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), ccnv(c2)), wcel(cop(c1, c0), c2))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)

comment: Ordered-pair membership in converse relation. (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-1995.)
